name: MinnetonkaLunchLady
0:
”Alexa, ask lunch lady what's for lunch today”
”Alexa, ask lunch lady what's for lunch at Groveland Elementary”
”Alexa, ask lunch lady what's for lunch tomorrow at the High School”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lunch lady
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Retrieve the lunch menu that is linked from the Minnetonka Minnesota Public School's web site at https://www.minnetonkaschools.org/district/departments/nutrition/menus-and-prices
Ask lunch lady what's for lunch on a specific day and/or at a specific school.
The skill will save a default school to simplify future requests; for example to just ask lunch lady what's for lunch without naming the building.
This skill independently developed by a district parent; this skill is not built, maintained, or supported by the Minnetonka Public School District or any of it's suppliers.
